title: .dat file how to Encryption and decryption?
content:
I am trying to decrypt or unpack a .dat file 

I used a variety of methods, but do not work

When opened in notepad the text would look like these:

answers_data.content: This is base64-encoded data, however data underneath it is unintelligible without further reverse engineering. How about reading the code that parses that data? an entry point could easily be base64 decoding/encoding functions
